rule:
The output must contain fewer than three

tags.
input: Life is beautiful. Mountains are grand. Oceans call.
validityText:
Upon evaluating the given input against the provided input specification, we note the following:

The input specification dictates that the text paragraph must contain at least three sentences. The input "Life is beautiful. Mountains are grand. Oceans call." does indeed contain three separate sentences, each ending with a period. The sentences are distinct and convey a complete thought, thereby meeting the requirement of the input specification.

Since the input meets the minimum requirement of containing at least three sentences, it complies with the input specification.

No violation.
OK
coverageText:
```html

Life is beautiful. Life can be challenging yet wonderful.

Mountains are grand. They stand tall and inspire awe.

Oceans call. Their waves and whispers invite exploration.

```
